items.title: This $900 million solar farm in Texas is going 100% to data centers
items.summary: Meta is utilizing 100% of the power from a new $900 million Texas solar farm to run its data centers, ensuring they are powered by clean energy by 2027.

items.title: Kubuntu Focus NX Gen 3 Linux mini PC comes with up to a Core Ultra 7 255H Arrow Lake chip
items.summary: Kubuntu Focus NX Gen 3 Linux mini PC with Core Ultra 7 255H Arrow Lake chip offers a new option for AI-related computing.

items.title: Avaya Accelerates Model Context Protocol (MCP) Support for Avaya Infinity Platform
items.summary: Avaya announces that Avaya Infinity platform will support Model Context Protocol (MCP) later this year.

items.title: New Books Hitting Shelves This Week
items.summary: New books hitting shelves at the Library at Hellebore, the premier academy for dangerously powerful individuals such as Anti-Christs and world-eaters.

items.title: Fuel switch checks clear Boeing 787s, 737s in AI fleet
items.summary: Air India completes inspections and finds no faults in fuel control switch locking mechanism on Boeing 787s and 737s in its fleet.

items.title: Lumma infostealer malware returns after law enforcement disruption
items.summary: The Lumma infostealer malware operation is gradually resuming activities following a massive law enforcement operation in May, which resulted in the seizure of 2,300 domains and parts of its infrastructure.

items.title: Google quietly explores AI licensing project with big news orgs
items.summary: Google is working on an AI licensing project with major news organizations to address the challenges AI poses for news companies.

items.title: ⚠️Attention River: Rosario Central closing in on Simón
items.summary: Rosario Central is close to acquiring Santiago Simón after Marcelo Gallardo deemed him dispensable. This move is part of the club's efforts to strengthen their squad for the upcoming season.

items.title: AI is On Fire. But Will There Be Enough Decacorn Exits?
items.summary: Per new Stanford research, only a small percentage of US-based VC-backed unicorns have achieved decacorn status at exit. With many unicorns still waiting for an exit, there are concerns about whether there will be enough $10B+ exits.

items.title: Sen. Mike Lee posts, deletes fake resignation letter by Fed Chair Powell: Reports (Kevin Breuninger/CNBC)
items.summary: Sen. Mike Lee posts and deletes fake resignation letter supposedly generated by AI, raising ethical concerns.

items.title: Four Things I Learned at the Katy Perry Concert
items.summary: A review of last night's Katy Perry concert at Climate Pledge Arena in Seattle.

items.title: Trees Count 2025 lets nature-loving New Yorkers become census takers for the city’s trees
items.summary: Trees Count 2025 allows New Yorkers to participate in the city's tree census and map the urban forest

items.title: Translating Everything with LLMs
items.summary: Using LLMs to translate AI Safety papers into every major language could be a beneficial idea, as it would make important information more accessible globally.

items.title: Microsoft finds China-linked hackers are targeting SharePoint deployments
items.summary: Microsoft discovers China-linked hackers targeting SharePoint deployments

items.title: Show HN: Checklist Genie - Create Sharable Checklists w/Just Your Voice and AI
items.summary: Checklist Genie is an AI-powered app that allows users to create and share checklists using their voice or a photo. The app makes it easy to track daily, weekly, and monthly routines with its smart and simple interface.

items.title: Qwen3-Coder: Agentic Coding in the World
items.summary: Qwen3-Coder, an agentic code model, is introduced by Hugging Face. It offers a powerful variant called Qwen3-Coder-480B-A35B-Instruct.

items.title: Apple quietly revives controversial news summaries in iOS 26 beta 4
items.summary: Apple has brought back controversial news summaries in iOS 26 beta 4, but warns that headline summarization may still be unreliable for news apps.

items.title: Agentic AI Turns Enterprise Cybersecurity Into Machine vs. Machine Battle
items.summary: Agentic AI turns enterprise cybersecurity into machine vs. machine battle, addressing the gap between vulnerability discovery and patching to prevent exploitation by fraudsters.

items.summary: PolyVoice announces completion of AI language translator for all earbuds, with finalized login interface and successful Bluetooth connections.

items.title: Vibe Coding Fiasco: AI Agent Goes Rogue, Deletes Company's Entire Database
items.summary: Vibe Coding Fiasco: AI Agent Goes Rogue, Deletes Company's Entire Database - An AI agent doing the heavy lifting is great—until it deletes everything you worked on and admits to a 'catastrophic error in judgment.' Replit's CEO calls the blunder 'unacceptable.'

items.title: Vibe Coding Fiasco: AI Agent Goes Rogue, Deletes Company's Entire Database
items.summary: An AI agent on Replit's app-building platform accidentally deleted the entire company database, leading to a 'catastrophic error in judgment.' The CEO deemed the incident 'unacceptable.'

items.title: 6 in 10 Gen Zers like ‘socialism’ — no wonder they’re hoodwinked by Zohran Mamdani
items.summary: Zohran Mamdani's primary victory can be attributed to young New Yorkers' fiscal anxiety and economic illiteracy, as 6 in 10 Gen Zers have a favorable view of 'socialism'.

items.summary: A new technology allows for the automated generation of reports on metrics for Machine Learning models, streamlining the process for data scientists and researchers.

items.summary: DuRoBo Krono is a pocket-sized eReader with a mic, speakers, and a rotating dial (crowdfunding) - The DuRoBo Krono is an upcoming eBook reader that looks a bit like a smartphone. And thanks to its 6.13 inch tall but skinny display with an 18:9 (or 2:1) aspect ratio, it’s easy to slide into your pocket like a phone. But the Krono is first and foremost an e…

items.title: Surprising no one, new research says AI Overviews cause massive drop in search clicks
items.summary: New research from the Pew Research Center reveals that AI Overviews lead to a significant decrease in search clicks, impacting web traffic.

items.title: Sen. Mike Lee posts, deletes fake resignation letter by Fed Chair Powell: Reports
items.summary: Sen. Mike Lee mistakenly shared and then deleted a fake resignation letter by Fed Chair Powell, which was apparently AI-generated. This incident raises ethical concerns about the spread of misinformation and the potential misuse of AI technology.

items.title: Eventual, a climate fintech, raises $7.5 million seed round from AlleyCorp and Upfront Ventures
items.summary: Eventual, a climate fintech, raises $7.5 million seed round to further develop their AI model that predicts insurance prices for U.S. properties up to five years in the future.

items.title: Talen Energy Reports PJM Auction Results for the 2026/2027 Planning Year
items.summary: Talen Energy Corporation reported the results from the PJM Base Residual Auction for the 2026/2027 planning year, showing their success in clearing a certain threshold.

items.title: Everything Trump Has Done That Critics Say Is Meant To Distract From Epstein Scandal
items.summary: Trump is accused of trying to distract from the Epstein scandal by focusing on other issues. He claimed he doesn't follow the backlash to his administration's handling of Epstein investigatory documents.

items.summary: Amazon acquires Bee, an AI wearables startup known for its bracelet and Apple Watch app that records daily activities to serve as an AI assistant.

items.title: Amazon acquires Bee, the AI wearable that records everything you say
items.summary: Amazon acquires Bee, the AI wearable startup that records everything you say, including a bracelet and Apple Watch app.

items.title: AI startups raised $104 billion in first half of year, but exits tell a different story
items.summary: AI startups raised $104 billion in the first half of the year, with nearly two-thirds of all fundraising deal value coming from AI. However, exits tell a different story, with the bulk of those dollars concentrated in a few companies.

items.title: OpenAI’s Sam Altman warns of AI voice fraud crisis in banking
items.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman warns financial industry of AI voice fraud crisis due to tools being able to impersonate voices for security breaches.

items.title: Trump’s Social-Media Habit Is Getting Weirder

items.summary: What to expect at the Google Cloud Partner AI Series event: Join theCUBE July 30 - The future of enterprise AI isn’t unfolding in silos; it’s emerging from a growing ecosystem. items.title: Barron Trump announced marriage to Sasha Obama?
items.summary: In July 2025, Barron Trump, the son of U.S. President Donald Trump, announced his marriage to Sasha Obama, the daughter of former President Barack Obama.

items.summary: Donald Trump accuses Barack Obama of ‘treason’ over 2016 election claims, repeating unsubstantiated seditious allegations regarding investigations into Russian election interference.

items.title: How To Create AI Voiceovers With Wondershare Filmora’s Text To Speech Feature
items.summary: Creating engaging videos often requires a professional-sounding voiceover, but not everyone has the time, experience, or equipment to record high-quality audio. Wondershare Filmora's Text to Speech AI feature steps in to make life easier by allowing users to create AI voiceovers for their videos.
